gameframe

Class AbstractGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameframe.AbstractGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game

    public abstract class AbstractGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game
    Game class that functions as the Model (MVC) of the Grid-Based Game Framework.
